item.title: MIUI V14.0.2.0.SLLRUXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi Civi 2 / 13 Lite Russia
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Civi 2 / 13 Lite Russia

Codename: ziyi

Version: V14.0.2.0.SLLRUXM | 12.0

Size: 6.4 GB

MD5: fac0b368bd2a83b7c7508847db6e6d9d

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to January 2023. Increased system security.
[Other]
Fix: Color rendering issues occurred in some cases
Fix: Charging icon wasn't displayed correctly

Download: Here
